intro: Scorzonera ikonnikovii, commonly known as the Ikonnikov's scorzonera, is a species of flowering plant in the family Asteraceae. It is native to the mountainous regions of Central Asia, particularly Kazakhstan and Kyrgyzstan. The plant is characterized by its upright stems and clusters of yellow to orange flowers. Its leaves are typically lance-shaped and covered in fine hairs. Scorzonera ikonnikovii is often found in rocky or gravelly soils and is adapted to harsh, alpine environments.
